This page will have a list of keyboard shortcuts that we learn during the course.


#### Clear the console : Ctrl + L 
#### Run current line of code : Ctrl/Cmd + Enter/Return
#### Run whole R script : Ctrl + Shift + S 
#### Pipe %>% operator : Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + M
#### See previous code in console: Up arrow key 
#### Show all shortcuts in RStudio: Shift + Alt + K 
#### Opens a new document in RStudio: Ctrl + Shift + N
